ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, i went on a kedge raid last weekend and died twice from drowning.  (i was already drowning, didn t have time to fire up the song--i m meticulous about my
ygData.messageBody:
heh, i went on a kedge raid last weekend and died twice from drowning. (i
was already drowning, didn't have time to fire up the song--i'm meticulous
about my songs and what's going on, i rarely pay attn to buffs dropping)
i'd gladly take these gloves even if they didn't have ac.

-----Original Message-----
> I'm still trying to figure out where they got the idea that we would have
a
> use for Enduring Breath (we have the spell and are guaranteed never to be
> out of the radius) and Summon drink (we are one of only 3 classes to get
> forage). It's bizarre. Seems to me like another case of:
> Question: "We have no idea what effect to put on Bard armor"
> Answer: "Hmmm, me neither, hey that fishbone earring is popular,
> give them
> Enduring Breath, and Summon Water goes well with that theme"
